annotation_sentence: The part with, um, data... data analysis. It take much time.
rationale: The verb 'take' should agree in number with the singular subject 'It', so it should be 'takes'.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I think so. But I worry about time. I have, um, many task to finish.
rationale: The noun 'task' should be plural to agree with the quantifier 'many', so it should be 'tasks'.

annotation_sentence: Thank you. I will work hard to finish all part.
rationale: The noun 'part' should be plural to agree with the quantifier 'all', so it should be 'parts'.
